short_desc: Provides 18 units of assisted independent living for youth transitioning out of the foster care system and youth with diagnosed mental health problems
description: Provides eighteen studio apartments with on site supportive services. Tenants are typically between 18 and 24 at the initiation of tenancy, have recently been in the foster care system and have an Axis 1 mental health diagnosis that impedes their smooth transition into adult life. The apartments are designed to provide both a supportive community and full independence for each tenant. Concurrent services include case management, mental health services when indicated, and on-going education and practice in independent living skills.
